question: Planting trees is very important for the environment. Some people says that trees should be planted in the vacant areas of cities and towns, while other says housing facilities should be built instead. Do you agree or disagree?
text: Growing Trees are essential for our ecosystem. Although there are people who believes that empty places should be used for planting trees. However, others are in view of building residential house for people to stay. In my opinion, I do not agree with using space for housing purpose instead it is a great deal if it is utilized for plantation.

It is often seen that cities and towns are becoming a concert jungle, which is the reason behind there are scarcity of place to stay there. Such place suffices the needs of residents, additional it can accommodate a large amount of people together. For instance, according to a survey conducted by The Municipal Corporation of New Mumbai, they say 75% of the population are shifted from the town , since it is for residential purpose only and compare to cities it offers larger area to stay plus far from the city hustle and bustle.  As a result, many of them opt to live where they can get a standard of living as well as they are away from the crowd.

On the other hand, it should be encouraged to use such places for planting trees, since they are vital to balance the atmosphere and supply oxygen to us. Due to the large amount of deforestation, we are facing global warming issues, which is going to be worst day by day if we do not rectify our mistakes. For example, a recent report by the World Health Organization says that, trees are a great source of oxygen and without which human life will not exist on the earth. That is why we should plant more and more trees to balance our environment for human living and for the earth

To conclude, to maintain the atmosphere of the world, it is essential to save plants and growing more and more trees are important for us rather than building houses. Right utilization of the place will help to save the planet and the humans.
